titleStmt.title: Gynaikeion: or, Nine bookes of various history. Concerninge women inscribed by ye names of ye nine Muses. Written by Thom: Heywoode.
titleStmt.author: Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641.

notesStmt.note: The title page is engraved; first word of title in Greek characters.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
